actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exemption from income taxation for cooperative housing corporations and condominium housing associations.

summary.text: Provides an exemption from income taxation under the Internal Revenue Code for cooperative housing corporations and condominium housing organizations if: (1) membership in such organization is limited to the owners of units within the project; (2) such owners are entitled to receive distribution from the organization only upon its liquidation; and (3) 80 percent or more of the gross income of the organization represents payments received from owners of units in the project.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exemption from income taxation for cooperative housing corporations and condominium housing associations.
